items.title: [The Verge] Trump is making coal plants even dirtier as AI demands more energy
items.content_html: The Trump administration just tossed out Biden-era restrictions on mercury and other toxic pollutants from power plants. Those standards are particularly impactful when it comes to pollution from coal plants […]
